newsitem.title: ZIMBABWE: Zimbabwe's Mugabe gets second son at 73.
newsitem.headline: Zimbabwe's Mugabe gets second son at 73.

text.p: Zimbabwean President Robert Mugabe's wife gave birth to a baby boy on Monday, the second son for the 73 -year-old president, local media reported on Thursday.
The official Herald newspaper published two pictures on its front page, one of the baby and another of Mugabe, his wife Grace and their three children.
Mugabe wed 38-year-old Grace Marufu, his former presidential secretary, last August at a lavish ceremony attended by over 20,000 guests.
They had two children out of wedlock, Bona, a girl now aged eight, and Robert Jnr, aged five. The new boy has not yet been named.
Mugabe's first wife Sally died in 1992, and the only child from their 32-year-old marriage died in the mid 1960s.
